API Reference¶

This reference provides detailed documentation for all modules, classes, and methods in the current release of Neurolearn. The root Neurolearn package is comprised of two modules: nltools.analysis and nltools.plotting. The analysis module contains functionality for prediction/classification, testing pattern response, and ROC analyses.

nltools.analysis: Analysis Tools¶

Analysis modules¶

NeuroLearn Analysis Tools¶

These tools provide the ability to quickly run machine-learning analyses on imaging data Author: Luke Chang License: MIT

nltools.analysis.apply_mask(data=None, weight_map=None, mask=None, method='dot_product', save_output=False, output_dir='.')¶

Apply Nifti weight map to Nifti Images. :param data: nibabel instance of data to be applied :param weight_map: nibabel instance of weight map :param mask: binary nibabel mask :param method: type of pattern expression (e.g,. ‘dot_product’,’correlation’) :param save_output: Boolean indicating whether or not to save output to csv file. :param output_dir: Directory to use for writing all outputs :param **kwargs: Additional parameters to pass

Outputs:
pexp: Outputs a vector of pattern expression values
